name: anewbeginning
description: A full-stack web application with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: npm run build-client && npm run build-server && npm run copy-client
scripts.build-client: cd client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
scripts.build-server: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.copy-client: cd server && (if not exist public mkdir public) && xcopy /E /I /Y ..\client\build\* public\
